title: Wheels up in Beijing
caption: Wheels up in Beijing
desc: Last Wednesday, 25 September, China officially opened the Daxing International Airport in Beijing. Constructed to ease pressure on the city's existing airport, Beijing Capital International, the bright orange starfish building took more than four years to construct. And hold on to your hats, because Daxing International will connect to China's capital city via high-speed train that travels at top speeds of more than 200mph.
